risk.title: Risk Warning
risk.text: When collateralizing DOWS to cast synthetic assets, a "debt" denominated in xUSD will be generated. Fluctuations in the value of synthetic assets held by others will affect the debt scale and thus affect the interests of each DOWS mortgagor.

mortgage.title: Staking Rewards
mortgage.text: Users who stake DOWS can obtain 3 kinds of rewards: 1. Exchange fee reward; 2. Staking reward; 3. Loan pool income

rate.title: Collateralization Ratio
rate.text: All synthetic assets are supported by the collateralized DOWS. The minimum collateralization ratio is 800%. If the collateralization ratio is lower than the requirement, you will not be able to get rewards and redeem DOWS. You can receive multiple rewards every week if the collateralization ratio is met.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.text: Shadows is a decentralized synthetic asset issuance protocol, trade protocol, and lending protocol built on Polkadot. The value of these synthetic assets is guaranteed by DOWS.

synthesis.title: Synthesis
synthesis.text: Collateralizing DOWS will cast synthetic asset xUSD which can be used in trading other synthetic assets.  Users obtain synthetic assets as rewards when meeting collateralization ratio

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.text: By using xUSD, you will be able to trade any synthetic assets supported by the system.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.text: Liquidity measures how easy it is to convert assets into cash quickly and without loss. The easier the conversion, the better the liquidity of the asset.

destroy.title: Burn
destroy.text: Burning xUSD will allow you to unlock your collateralized DOWS and meanwhile reduce your ‘debt’ in the system

reward.title: Reward
reward.text: Stake DOWS to cast synthetic assets, trade synthetic assets, and get rewards every week
reward.bottomText: If you don’t claim it for 7 days, the reward will be recycled to the pool. If the collateralization ratio is insufficient, you will not be able to get the reward.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.text: Please check your receipt address very carefully.

confirmation.title: Please confirm transaction
confirmation.text: To continue, follow the prompts on your Metamask Wallet.

completion.title: Sending in progress!
completion.text: Your transaction has been broadcast to the Ethereum network. You may close this window as the transaction will complete in the background.
